name: F1 Upcoming Race
description: F1 Upcoming Race extension displays the timings for F1 race weekends and allows users to customize their experience based on their time zone. It is a tool for F1 fans to stay informed about the race weekend schedule. This extension is unofficial and is not associated in any way with the Formula 1 companies. F1, FORMULA ONE, FORMULA 1, FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP, GRAND PRIX and related marks are trade marks of Formula One Licensing B.V.
